title: Double Stamp
description: A subcontractor cell steals a prototype sensor module, marking the beginning of Twist 1.

scenes.narrative: You've tracked the subcontractor cell to an industrial warehouse. Security is minimal, but the sensor module is highly valuable.

choices.label: Infiltrate by posing as a delivery driver.
choices.consequence: You gain access and overhear the cell discussing the sensor theft.

choices.label: Monitor perimeter for patterns in guard rotations.
choices.consequence: You identify a predictable gap in security coverage.

choices.label: Use thermal imaging to locate the module inside.
choices.consequence: Imaging shows the module's heat signature in a specific storage unit.

choices.label: The warehouse layout feels familiar - check for hidden compartments.
choices.consequence: You find concealed storage areas not on the blueprints.

scenes.narrative: Inside the warehouse, you confront the cell leader. Gasket appears briefly, muttering about timing.

choices.label: Try to de-escalate and get information from the leader.
choices.consequence: The leader reveals details about the subcontractor's involvement.

choices.label: Secure the sensor module first, question later.
choices.consequence: You recover the module intact and gather evidence from the scene.

choices.label: Deploy containment field around the module.
choices.consequence: The field prevents tampering and preserves evidence.

choices.label: Gasket's right - the timing is everything here.
choices.consequence: You notice custody forms with double stamps, triggering Gasket's fragment.
